channel.title: Lua Multi-Return As Parameters to Function
channel.description: *[[Ren-C Multi Return]](https://rebol.metaeducation.com/t/the-history-of-multi-return-in-ren-c/1134)* ...seems like a lua feature. [Multiple return values](https://www.lua.org/pil/5.1.html) that work with [multiple assignment of variables](https://www.lua.org/pil/4.1.html), but also of the [parameters](https://www.lua.org/pil/5.2.html) of a calling function.

item.title: Lua Multi-Return As Parameters to Function
item.dc:creator: LkpPo
item.description:
[Ren-C Multi Return] ...seems like a lua feature. Multiple return values that work with multiple assignment of variables, but also of the parameters of a calling function.
